name: Shuckle
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.

abilities.name: Fresh Squeezed
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and discard them. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Energy Drink
attacks.effect: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.
